caption: The male protagonist walked alone through the night, crossing a square and entering a forest. He grabbed a golden sphere, and when he opened it, he found an object inside. Soon, he was surrounded by many phantoms, ethereal figures taking human forms, with whom he engaged in conversations. In the darkness, a bald-headed demon wielding a wand appeared. At that moment, the male protagonist revealed himself, and the bald figure cast a spell on him. After a bright flash, the boy found himself in a white world, where he encountered an elderly person in white robes and walked around with him.
